title: The Billionaire's Baby
description: Sophie has been in love with her best friend Ella's brother, Billionaire Maxwell Van Harkel, for years. When she goes to spend the winter holiday with the family in their country home Sophie is excited to see if she could possibly have a connection with Max.However Maxwell has turned into a Dr. Jekkyl and Mr. Hyde character. Some days he is great and other days he treats her like she doesn't exist. When Sophie lies to get her own way, she triggers a domino effect and she doesn't know if her life will ever be the same.For while Sophie loves Maxwell, he is hiding a deep dark secret that will threaten to destroy everything she has ever felt for him.The Billionaire's Baby (The Full Series) contains:1. The Words He Wanted To Hear2. The Words He Didn't Want To Hear3. No Words Left To SayThis is an erotic romance series that features spicy sex scenes and a love to beat all odds.
author: Helen    Cooper
